001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003public class PokemonFactory implements IPokemonFactory {
004    @Override
005    public Pokemon createPokemon(int index, int cp, int hp, int dust, int candy) {
006        PokemonMetadataProvider pokemonMetadataProvider = new PokemonMetadataProvider();
007        try {
008            PokemonMetadata pokemonMetadata = pokemonMetadataProvider.getPokemonMetadata(index);
009            int iv; // pas pratique car il faudra un if par pokemon, mais ici Ã§a fait le boulot
010            if (index == 0) {
011                iv = 56; // Iv de bulbizarre
012            }
013            if (index == 133) {
014                iv = 100; // Iv de d'aquali
015            } else {
016                iv = 0;
017            }
018            return new Pokemon(index, pokemonMetadata.getName(), pokemonMetadata.getAttack(), pokemonMetadata.getDefense(), pokemonMetadata.getStamina(), cp, hp, dust, candy, iv);
019        } catch (PokedexException e) {
020            return null;
021        }
022    }
023}
024
025
026
